channel.title: Dani Deahl Presents
channel.itunes:author: Dani Deahl
channel.description: The newest from Chicago electro house DJ/producer Dani Deahl! Including mixes, exclusive previews for upcoming singles and material from her label, Calamity Jane Recordings.

item.title: Get Nasty Valentines Day Mix For Sol Republic
item.itunes:author: Dani Deahl
item.description:
I did this mix for Sol Republic headphones (solrepublic.com) earlier in February, just in time for Valentines Day. They had originally asked me to do a 'luvstep' mix, but the more I worked on it, the less into it I was. After all, I don't even celebrate Valentines Day. Then inspiration struck. Meet my 'Get Nasty' Valentines Day mix - because nothing says 'I love you baby' like Mic Terror and DJ Funk.
Get on with your bad self...or with someone else.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mix made for Sol Republic Headphones - solrepublic.com
item.itunes:summary:

Meet my 'Get Nasty' Valentines Day mix - because nothing says 'I love you baby' like Mic Terror and DJ Funk.
Get on with your bad self...or with someone else.

item.title: DSquared Vol. 3
item.itunes:author: Dani Deahl
item.description:
Download it - share it - play it in your car - have sex to it - get ready to party with it - practice quantum physics to it - blast it.

TRACKLIST:
1. Botnek - Dozer
2. Black Matter - Pressure
3. Klaxons - Echoes (Designer Drugs Remix)
4. Gotye - Somebody That I Used To Know (Mickey Fortune Bootleg Mix)
5. Style Of Eye - Sexx (Matt Sayers 'Pink Eye' Remix)
6. Fabian - Last Flight (RESET! Remix)
7. Madison - Hot Hot Love (Kids At The Bar Remix)
8. Nom De Strip - De Piano (Breakdown Remix)
9. Justice Vs. Laidback Luke & Steve Aoki - Turbulence Are Your Friends (Revolvr Bootleg)
10. Black Tiger Sex Machine - The Kannibalen Anthem
11. Temabes - Paradise
12. Wolfgang Gartner Vs. Swanky Tunes - Space House (Nick Svenson Bootleg)
13. Daft Punk - Around The World (Dic Money & Kid Dub Mashup)
14. Robin S, Will Bailey, Figure & AC Slater - Show Me Bass Powa (Oh Snap!! Bootleg)
15. Crizzly & Kids At The Bar - Like Dat
16. Kreayshawn - Gucci Gucci (ReepR Remix)
17. Market Price Vs. Jay-Z Vs. Kanye West - Why I Love You
18. Peacetreaty & Kissed With A Noise - Cal State Anthem (Cold Blank Remix - Dublic Rerub)
19. autoKratz - A-Train
20. Hot Pink Delorean - Get It Girl (Filth Remix)
21. Barletta - Suspended (Fire Alarm)
22. Anjulie - Brand New Bitch (Black Cards Remix)
23. Clockwork - Weaver
24. The H20 Project & Zedd - Scary Celeron (Criminal Minds Mashup)
item.itunes:subtitle: Your favorite series that highlights the best of the best featured over the past few months at the dsquared blog: http://www.danideahl.com/blog. Visit the site for these tunes and tons more free downloads.

item.title: Dani Deahl for Plugged not Thugged
item.itunes:author: Dani Deahl
item.description:
"Plugcast 012 delivered live and direct from Chi-Town’s one and only stingray electro selector Dani Deahl. A veteran in the global house & electro scene and clearly on her hustle and grind, not only has Dani graced big rigs like Lollapalooza and been writing for Urb & TimeOut Magazine, but she’s also transformed some Toronto late night floors into ceiling dripper rave caves leading one Mr. Dick Diamonds to requisition this here cast. For this taping, Deahl brings it heavy from start to finish with peak time heat from Bart B More, LA Riots & Cirez D as well as fist pump remixes from the likes of Congorock, Felix Cartal & Foamo." - http://pluggednotthugged.com

Tracklist:
0. Intro
1. Bart B More – Brapapella
2. 3 Is A Crowd – Metalheart
3. Hardwell – Molotov (Apster Remix)
4. Cirez D – The Tumble
5. St. Mandrew & JFK – Face Pump (Congorock Remix)
6. Udachi – Swagger (Instrumental)
7. Green Velvet – Harmageddon (Felix Cartal Remix)
8. The Subs – Vomit In Style (Don Rimini Chi Town Remix)
9. LA Riots – Drop
10. Nas & Damian Marley – As We Enter (Foamo Remix Instrumental)
11. Teki Latex – Dinosaurs With Guns (Chewy Chocolate Cookies Remix)
12. Kaskade vs. Congorock – Dynasty Babylon (Eran Hersh & Darmon Edit)
13. Felix Da Housecat – Oops!
14. L-Vis 1990 – Reprise
15. The Cheerz – La French Patrass (Douster Remix)
16. The Count & Sinden & Mystery Jets – After Dark (Buraka Som Sistema Remix)
17. Thunderheist – Drive-In (Drop The Lime Remix)
18. Mason – Let’s Get Ferretic
item.itunes:subtitle: Toronto blog Plugged not Thugged asked me to create a mix just for them...so I did, and it's truly banging with an intro I made just for giggles.

item.title: Ghetto House Radio September 2010
item.itunes:author: Dani Deahl
item.description:
I do a set for Ghetto House Radio (http://www.ghettohouseradio.com/) every month and for September, I decided to take a sidestep with some vocal-driven, slightly more laid back tunes (laid back for me, anyway).

1. The Ting Tings - Hands
2. Kid Cudi - Pursuit of Happiness (Aoki Remix - 1der No Rave Edit)
3. The Dance Party - Pretty Girl (Breakdown Remix)
4. Oh Land - Son of a Gun (Savage Skulls Remix)
5. Crookers - Royal T Feat. Róisín Murphy (Larry Tee & Beckwith Remix)
6. DJ Fresh - Fight (Shooting Horses Remix)
7. Chelley - Took The Night (Joe Maz of DiscoTech's 1990 Bootleg)
8. M.I.A. & Jay-Z - Xxxo (Fulton yard Waltboogie Remix)
9. Carte Blanche feat. Kid Sister - Do! Do! Do!
10. D.A.M.B. - Waiting
11. LOL Boys - Counting (123 Reprise)
item.itunes:subtitle: http://www.ghettohouseradio.com/

item.title: dsquared Vol. 1
item.itunes:author: Dani Deahl
item.description:
A live, hour long mix made entirely from songs found on my blog! Find all the songs used for the mix on dsquared, along with hundreds of others.

Always legal, always free, always 320 ;-) http://www.danideahl.com/music

1. Axwell: Nothing But Love (Diesel Laws Remix)
2. Nick Thayer: Ten Acre Dust
3. Tiga: What You Need (Lucky Date Remix)
4. Playdoe: Ice Cream (Lapse Remix)
5. Boy 8-Bit: Suspense Is Killing Me (Philipe de Boyer Remix)
6. Danny Tenaglia: Music Is The Answer (Breakdown Remix)
7. Swedish House Mafia vs. Lady Gaga vs. Congorock: One Monster (Morningstar Mix)
8. Lee Mortimer & Foamo: Superman (Reset! Remix)
9. Calvertron & Tim Healey: Back 2 The Ghetto (Mother Superior Turf Invasion Edit)
10. Only Children: Don't Stop (DJ Kue Remix)
11. Mason feat. DMC & Sam Sparro: Corrected (Riva Starr Vocal Remix)
12. Andy Caldwell: Funk Nasty feat. Gram'ma Funk (Wolfgang Gartner Remix)
13. Tape Deck Bros: Ela e Linda
14. Reboot: Enjoy (Dooze Jackers Remix)
15. Matty G & Reeps: Party 'n' Play (Sloppy 5ths Remix)
16. Hijack vs. Hatiras: Possessed By A Bitch (JLR Mashapella)
17. Deadmau5 & Fixd: Some Chords (And Some More Noted Fixd Remix)
18. La Roux: Bulletproof (Larry Tee & Alexander Technique Blogula Remix)
19. Hostage: Roll

item.title: Dance The Grey Away
item.itunes:author: Dani Deahl
item.description:
1. Heads We Dance: When The Sirens Sound (Russ Chimes Remix)
2. Patrick Wayne vs. Stardust: Music Sounds Better Re-edit
3. SomethingALaMode feat. K FLay: 5am (Pance Party Remix)
4. Miami Horror: Sometimes (Universe Remix)

6. Crystal Castles: Crimewave (Midnight Conspiracy Remix)

8. Gorillaz: Stylo (Alex Metric Remix)
9. Bag Raiders: Shooting Stars (Cassian Remix)
10. Alan Braxe & Fred Falke: Intro (Bart B More Remix)
11. Fukkk Offf: Utopia

13. Marina And The Diamonds: Hollywood (Monarchy Gliese Remix)
14. Pony Pony Run Run: Walking On A Line (Lifelike Extended Remix)
15. Dragonette: Easy (Buffetlibre Mix)
16. Amanda Blank: Shame On Me (Viking Remix)
17. Swick: Grow Up (Cassian Remix)
18. TV Rock: In The Air (Grum Remix)
19. Seb: The Other Side
item.itunes:subtitle: A new mix with a slightly different feel. Made as a demo to tour with a band in Latin America, the mix was inspired by a stretch of cloudy weather here in Chicago. The result was a mix designed to lift spirits, to "Dance The Grey Away".
item.itunes:summary:
1. Heads We Dance: When The Sirens Sound (Russ Chimes Remix)

item.title: Interview with Perry Farrell by Dani Deahl
item.itunes:author: Dani Deahl
item.description: For URB.com: I talk with Lollapalooza founder and Jane's Addiction front man Perry Farrell about DJing, electronic music and how he fits into the scene. (Apologies for the not so great audio quality, we did not have the best connection).

item.title: Interview with Tiga by Dani Deahl
item.itunes:author: Tiga
item.description: Dani Deahl interviews Montreal's Tiga about new album "Ciao!" Listen to find out about his inspirations, what it's like to work with Soulwax and how singing inadvertently became a central point of his musical career. Find the written interview at urb.com.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dani Deahl interviews Montreal's Tiga about new album "Ciao!" Listen to find out about his inspirations, what it's like to work with Soulwax and how singing inadvertently became a central point of his musical career. Find the written interview at urb.com.
